item.title: “一个时代的终结”：中国不再允许外国家庭收养中国儿童
item.description: China Stops Foreign Adoptions, Ending a Complicated Chapter 艾莎, ZIXU WANG For three decades, China sent tens of thousands of young children overseas for adoption as it enforced a strict one-child policy that forced many families to abandon their babies.
